text: Constantin Rădulescu may refer to: *Constantin Rădulescu-Motru ("Motru", 1868–1957), Romanian academic and politician *Constantin Rădulescu (footballer, born 1896) ("Costel", 1896–1981), Romanian goalkeeper, football manager and bobsledder *Constantin Rădulescu (footballer, born 1924) ("Jumate", 1924–2001), Romanian midfielder and football manager
title: Constantin Rădulescu
